japanese: ふふふふふ……。
translation: Teehee...

japanese:
やった、やったわ。
ついに終わったーっ！
translation:
It's over, it's over.
It's finally over!

japanese:
これで！
食料集めと勉強ばかりの日々とおさらばなんだから！
translation: Finally! The days of gathering food and studying are over!

japanese:
そして、ようやく心置きなく
フー君とのバカンスが楽しめるんだわ。
translation:
And finally I can enjoy my vacation
with Fu-kun without any worries.

japanese:
やりたいことはたくさんあるのよね～。
一緒に泳ぎに行ったり夜の散歩をしたり！
translation:
There's so much I want to do.
We can go swimming together or take a walk at night!

japanese:
さあ、今日と明日で
フー君の心をしっかり掴んでみせるわよ！
translation:
Alright, I will totally SNATCH Fu-kun's heart
over the course of the next two days.

japanese: じゃ、まずはフー君を起こしに行かなくちゃ。
translation: So, first I need to wake Fu-kun up.

japanese:
あ、そうだわ。
そのまま朝日の中、２人っきりで
散歩なんてのもいいわね～。
translation:
Oh!
Just the two of us walking in the morning sun would be nice.

japanese: フー君、おはよう。
translation: Fu-kun, good morning.

japanese:
（あら？　返事がないわね。
　聞こえなかったのかしら。
　この時間だから、まだ寝てるのかも）
translation:
(Huh? There's no response.
 I wonder if he was able to hear me.
 He still might be sleeping at this time.)

japanese:
フー君！
朝よ、起きてる？
translation:
Fu-kun!
It's morning, are you awake?

japanese: ……よお二乃、もう朝か。
translation: ...Hey, Nino, is it already morning?

japanese:
（こんな物憂げなフー君、初めて……
　こういうのも素敵だわっ！）
translation:
(I've never seen Fu-kun this weary before...
 Seeing him like this is so lovely!)

japanese:
警戒してないっていうか、
素の状態っていうか、儚い感じ……。
translation:
Not being vigilant at all,
not being his normal self. It won't probably last long...

japanese:
お前、なにブツブツ言って……。
ん……。
translation:
What are you muttering about...
Mm...

japanese:
えっ、フー君？
どうし――ひゃっ！？
translation:
Huh. Fu-kun?
What's wro%p-2;――%p; HYAA?!

japanese: ちょ、え、えええええっ！？
translation: What the, ehh, ehhhhhhhh?!

japanese:
フー君、顔が近いんだけど！？
えっ、なんで？　どどど、どうしたのよ！？
translation:
Fu-kun, your face is so CLOSE to mine?!
Huh, WHY? Wh-wh-wh-what's wrong?!

japanese:
あ、あの、フー君？
ねえ、何か言ってほしいんだけど……。
translation:
U-um, Fu-kun?
Hey, I want you to say something...

japanese: いきなりは……困るわ……。
translation: That's too sudden...we will be in big trouble...

japanese: すー……すー……。
translation: Zzz... Zzz...
HUH?

japanese: ぐー……すー……。
translation: Zzz... Zzz...

japanese: フー君、寝てるの？
translation: Fu-kun, are you sleeping?

japanese: すー……すー……。
translation: Zzz... Zzz...

japanese:
もう……。
一瞬でも期待しちゃった私が
バカみたいじゃない……。
translation:
Oh no...
I feel like a fool for getting my hopes up, even for a moment...

japanese:
フー君、起きて。
ほら、しっかりしなさいよ。
translation:
Fu-kun, wake up.
Come on, get a hold of yourself.

japanese:
んあ……。
二乃、おはよう……。
translation:
Nnaah...
Nino, good morning...

japanese:
はいはい、おはよ。
こんなところで寝てたら風邪ひいちゃうわ。
とりあえず中に入りましょ。
translation:
Yeah yeah, mornin'.
If you sleep outside of your bed, you'll catch cold.
Get into bed, first.

japanese: おう……。
translation: Yeah...

japanese: うわぁ……。
translation: Uwaaa...

japanese:
（机の上に積まれた山のような問題集……。
　辞書、それに単語帳……）
translation:
(A pile of textbooks on his desk...
 A dictionary, and vocabulary flashcards...)

japanese: フー君、もしかして朝から勉強してたの？
translation: Fu-kun, were you perhaps studying this morning?

japanese:
すまん……。
夕べ寝る前に問題集を解いていたら……
不安になってな……。
translation:
Sorry...
I was solving problems from a workbook until I went to sleep
last night... I felt uneasy...

japanese:
ここでの生活で学力が低下してしまって
いるのではないかと……つい、徹夜を……。
translation:
I was wondering if my academic ability has declined
in the course of our vacation...
I kinda stayed up all night...

japanese: はあ？　徹夜ですって？
translation: Huh? You stayed up all night, seriously?

japanese:
あっきれた……。
みんなで夏を楽しもうって言ったのに。
translation:
I can't believe you...
Even though you said
we should be enjoying this summer together.

japanese: ……わかってる。
translation: ...I get that.

japanese:
お前らはちゃんと課せられたテストをクリアした。
ひいき目じゃなく、きちんと成長していると
実感したよ。
translation:
You guys passed the tests I prepared for you.
And without overexaggerating anything, I think that everybody 
has grown a lot.

japanese:
だが、俺自身はどうだろう？
何か少しでも成長したのかと……。
translation:
However, what about myself?
I wonder if I even have a grown a bit...

japanese:
むしろ、ここにいたあいだに
学力が下がってしまっていやしないかと……！
translation:
Or perhaps, my academic ability has DECREASED, while being 
here!

japanese: それで徹夜？
translation: And you stayed up all night because of that?

japanese:
……お前たちは予想外の成長を見せてくれた。
それを見たからこそ……勉強をせずには
いられなかったんだ。
translation:
...You have all shown unexpected growth.
Witnessing that...I couldn't help but study.

japanese:
何それ？
あーあ、もう、フー君らしいわ。
translation:
What the...?
Oooh, that is so typical of you, Fu-kun.

japanese:
……まあ、呆れるよな。
俺も自分で自分に呆れてるところだ。
translation:
...Well, it's kinda annoying, right.
I'm pretty fed up with myself too.

japanese: 本当に、ブレないんだから。
translation: You never stray from your path.

japanese:
（楽しむって決めても、こうして勉強しちゃう。
　絶対に今に満足なんてしないし、
　先に進むための努力を惜しまない）
translation:
(Even if Fu-kun decides to enjoy himself,
 he's always studying. He'll never be satisfied with
 his current state, and will strive to improve himself.)

japanese:
（一本筋が通っているっていうか……
　それって誰にでもできることじゃないのよ？
　なのに呆れるわけないじゃない）
translation:
(I mean, it makes sense...
 that's not something that anyone can do.
 Why should it bother me?)

japanese: 本人は気づいてないみたいだけど。
translation: There's something you don't realize.

japanese: 何がだ？
translation: What?

japanese: ううん、気にしないで。
translation: Nothing, don't worry about it.

japanese:
それより、
しばらく寝てたほうがいいんじゃない？
ひどい顔してるもの。
translation:
Anyhow,
you should sleep a bit.
You look really awful.

japanese:
徹夜のせいだけじゃなくて、今までの疲れも
出ちゃったんじゃないかしら。
translation:
It's not just from staying up all night,
all the heavy lifting you did for us in the last few days are taking a toll
on you.

japanese: しかし……。
translation: But...

japanese:
大丈夫！
フー君の看病はしっかりしてあげるわ。
安心して休んでちょうだい。
translation:
Don't worry!
I'll take good care of you, Fu-kun.
Take it easy and get some rest.

japanese:
今日まで私たちのために頑張ってくれたんだもの。
今度は私たちが頑張る番だわ。
translation:
You exhausted yourself for us.
Today is our turn to do the same for you.

japanese:
だから、今日はゆっくり寝ること。
いいわね？
translation:
Take it easy for today.
Okay?

japanese:
……すまん。
その言葉に甘えさせてくれ。
translation:
...Thank you.
I'd like to accept your offer.

japanese:
ええ、任せて！
たっぷり甘やかしてあげるわ。
translation:
Yes, leave it to me!
I'll spoil you rotten.

japanese:
じゃあ、みんなに伝えてくるから、
フー君はちゃんと寝てなさいよ。
translation:
Okay then, I'll tell everyone,
please get some sleep, Fu-kun.

japanese:
あ、ベッドに単語帳を持ち込んだりしたら
ダメだからね。
translation: Oh, and take your flashcards into bed, okay?

japanese: わかったよ。
translation: Yeah, I got it.
